name: InfuSystem Holdings, Inc.
description: InfuSystem Holdings, Inc. is a company that operates in the healthcare sector. It is a leading national health care service provider, specializing in outpatient care for durable medical equipment manufacturers and health care providers. The company's services are provided through two platforms: Integrated Therapy Services (ITS) and Durable Medical Equipment Services (DME Services). InfuSystem supplies infusion pumps, disposable supply kits, and durable medical equipment to oncology, infusion, and hospital outpatient chemotherapy clinics in the United States and Canada. The company also offers biomedical recertification, maintenance, repair services, and local customer support. Headquarters are in Rochester Hills, Michigan.
